# Database Migration Project

**Status**: Completed  
**Priority**: High  
**Lead**: Database Team  
**Parent**: [[../project-overview.md]]

## Overview

Migration from file-based storage to structured database for improved performance and scalability.

## Migration Steps

1. ✅ Schema design
2. ✅ Data export from old system
3. ✅ Database setup and configuration
4. ✅ Data import and validation
5. ✅ Application integration testing

## New Schema Features

- Structured metadata storage
- Full-text search capabilities
- Relationship tracking
- Performance indexes

## Performance Improvements

- 90% faster search queries
- 50% reduction in storage space
- Better concurrent access handling

## Rollback Plan

- Database backup before migration
- Parallel systems during transition
- Quick rollback procedures documented

## Related Projects

- Backend API integration: [[backend-api.md]]
- Frontend updates needed: [[frontend-redesign.md]]
